name: connect-once
description: Request connection once and memorize it for later

scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- test/*.js -R spec -t 1000 && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Vsevolod Strukchinsky <floatdrop@gmail.com>
